column1: Tyelkormo was the Amilessë of Celegorm of Fëanor. It means "Hasty-riser" and it is a reference to his quick temper.
column2: The names of the Sons of Fëanor with the legend of the fate of Amrod
his name was Sindarization as Celegorm.

column1: The name is composed of three elements: tyelka "swift" + óre "rising" + -mo "-er"
